author: Kathleen Harris
title: Trudeau set to announce expanded eligibility for emergency benefits
description: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau will announce more flexible rules for claiming the Canada emergency response benefit (CERB) Wednesday in response to criticism the current regime excludes students and people working reduced hours.
content:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau will announce more flexible rules for claiming the Canada emergency response benefit (CERB) Wednesday in response to criticism the current regime excludes students and people working reduced hours.
